name: Abeta Link PunchOut
author: Abeta

sections.description:
This plugin allows your customers to connect their ERP system to your WooCommerce webshop via OCI PunchOut.
Different ERP / procurement systems can be easily connected using Abeta Link, allowing you to quickly connect with different ERP and procurement systems.

After installing the plugin you need to create an account on www.abeta.link .

NOTE:
1. For every user that logs in using this connection a new customer will be created and deleted. This is to ensure that simultaneous connections do NOT interfere with each other.
2. Orders confirmed in the ERP system will be send back to you by mail. If there is enough demand a seperate plugin will be created to handle automated order creation.

Please leave your feedback and suggestions for improvement in the WordPress Forum belonging to this plugin.

From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Abeta PunchOut’
  3. Activate ‘Abeta PunchOut’ from your Plugins page.
  4. Go to “after activation” below.

Manually

  1. Upload the ‘abeta-punchout’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the ‘Abeta PunchOut’ plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “after activation” below.

After Activation

Contact us via www.abeta.nl, or login as an existing user.
A new Shop can be created on Abeta Link, the corresponding API KEY needs to be copy and pasted in the configuration of the Abeta PunchOut plugin.
sections.faq: If there are any questions please don’t hesitate to send them to info [-@-] abeta.nl .
sections.changelog:
0.4

Original release

1.0

Breaking release relative to v0.4! Do not upgrade if you do not want to use the Abeta Service!

2.0.1

New release with breaking changes relative to v1.0 !

2.0.3

Small changes relating to cookie settings and category retrieval

2.0.3

Prevent admin from Punchout and session adjustment

2.0.4

General improvements

2.0.5

General improvements

2.0.6

General improvements

2.0.7

General improvements

2.0.8

Increase plugin compatibility

2.0.9

WordPress 6.6

short_description: This plugin connects your WooCommerce shop with the Abeta PunchOut Platform, to make OCI PunchOut availabe to your customers.
